flawed_nl_solution:
Ivan spent a total of $10 - $3 = $<<10-3=7>>7 on cupcakes and a milkshake.
The cost of the cupcake is $10 x 1/5 = $<<10*1/5=50/1>>50/1.
So, $7 - $50/1 = $<<7-50/1=-43>>-43 was spent on the milkshake.
#### -43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 50/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
